dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan turns on the Camera and the screen begins to pull int focus. It is pointed directly at ALEX, a young boy no mor then 15 years old. Next to ALEX is his slightly older bro TYLER, a young boy around the same age.

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: Today is a special day isn’t it?

dialogues.text: Dad...

dialogues.text: Is it Chanukah?

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: Is it Passover?

dialogues.speaker: ALEX

dialogues.speaker: DAN

dialogues.text: Why are you filming this? You're annoying me.

dialogues.text: Haha quit being so lame dad!

dialogues.text: But I film your birthday every year.

dialogues.speaker: LINDSEY
dialogues.text: Dad he’s getting a bit old for this. The camera pans to reveal LINDSEY, a pretty 18 year old g

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: Well! Look who decided to be a part of the video, say hi Lindsey! He waits for a moment and she makes a face of irritation the camera.

dialogues.speaker: DAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Do you have anything to say to your brother on his birthday? Something shatters off screen.

dialogues.speaker: MELISSA
dialogues.text: Shit! Honey can you help me pick this up? Somebody left the door open and I bumped into it and dropped everything.

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: Coming dear. Dan begins walking with the camera through the house to t kitchen. When we arrive in the kitchen Melissa is on her hands and knees scrubbing the floor.

dialogues.speaker: DAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: As you all see my wife has everything under control here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan can you put that camera down for a second and help me clean this up?

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: Yes Honey. Dan places the camera down on the counter as it points towards them cleaning the floor.

dialogues.speaker: MELISSA
dialogues.text: Thanks dear. She looks over Dan’s shoulder for a second and then looks back at him.

dialogues.speaker: MELISSA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Did you pick up Alex’s Video Game from the store?

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: Of course. I am good for something you know?

dialogues.speaker: MELISSA
dialogues.text: I know, it’s just sometimes you forget about things.

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: I would never forget my son’s birthday.

dialogues.speaker: MELISSA
dialogues.text: Oh but forgetting our anniversary you can do? Dan looks back at her a bit upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Melissa, that was over a month ago. I'm sorry. I already made it up to you a million times over. This new job is killing me, you know that.

dialogues.speaker: MELISSA
dialogues.text: We can talk about it later. She stands up and so does Dan. He walks over to the Camer and picks it up again. Dan then starts walking back into other room. When he gets there he turns down the lights a Melissa begins walking in holding a birthday cake with li candles. As the camera pans around to show all the somewhat smilin faces, just as they are about to start singing, there is crash. Everyone pauses for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: DAN
dialogues.text: What was that? The power is suddenly cut to the house. Dan turns with th camera and points it back towards the kitchen. He starts walking over there to see what it was. As the camera arri in the kitchen we reveal a larger man standing in the mid of the kitchen dressed in all black wearing a ski-mask.

dialogues.speaker: DAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Everyone Run! The man raises his hand to his mouth in an attempt to sil Dan. Dan spins around and heads back to the front door wh another man is standing there holding a gun to dan’s wife

dialogues.text: Hahaha! Dan backs up slowly and edges around the corner, he make break for it and heads up stairs. When he gets up stairs enters his son’s room. He pan’s around the room. He then looks in the closet. There is no one there. He then walks over to the bed. a hand reaches out from under the bed an grabs his foot. Dan squats down and sees his sons. He sli under the bed. Just as he get’s under the bed we hear som screaming.

One which belongs to a masked man, the other which belongs to Lindsay. Lindsay i still screaming and struggling. She suddenly stops. She i thrown onto the ground quickly with the profile of her fa with makeup running, directly in view of the camera. A handgun Is being pressed against her head.

dialogues.text: I could pop your fucking head open like a watermelon right now. You know that right? Lindsay flails and screams a muffled scream underneath Three’s boot.

dialogues.text: But I’m not gonna do that just yet. I want you to eat the fucking grass and dirt like a filthy little animal. Lindsay flails and screams more.

dialogues.text: You have 3 seconds. Lindsay reaches forward and grabs a clump of grass and shovels it into her mouth. Three takes his foot off of he and lays down next to her. His face pressed against hers.

dialogues.text: What the fuck. Why? Two turns to look at Three.

dialogues.text: Daddy help! Three kicks Lindsay in the face and she gets knocked out.

dialogues.speaker: THREE

dialogues.text: I'll tear this bitch a new asshole later. Three helps Lindsay, who is still unconscious, up. He car her over his shoulder. As he carries her he manages to fo her butt.

dialogues.text: Let’s just get John and get the fuck out. By now this guy’s probably called the cops.

dialogues.speaker: THREE
dialogues.text: No... I want to make them suffer for what they did to my brother. TWO looks at THREE and pauses.

dialogues.speaker: TWO
dialogues.text: He was like a brother to me, too, man. I don’t know why you gotta be such a bitch about this when I’m keeping my shit together fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck you! THREE shoves TWO.

dialogues.text: Alright, alright. Christ. Let’s go.

dialogues.text: (Referring to LINDSEY on his back) What about this bitch?

dialogues.speaker: TWO
dialogues.text: We take her along. She’s our bargaining chip. 57. TWO then gestures to THREE to quietly head a different wa Instead of climbing back through the window, they head to another area of the house which is apparently open.

dialogues.speaker: TWO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I hope to hell they don’t have a gun in there. This is risky as fuck.

dialogues.text: Jews don’t have guns.

dialogues.text: I don’t trust this guy. I wannna get out of here. They reach their destination and enter. This is presumabl where they originally broke in and cut the power.

dialogues.speaker: TWO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: In and out, we get John and leave. No bullshit, alright?  58.

dialogues.text: No way in hell I’m gonna forget this night. Now, quiet! TWO and THREE enter. Guns drawn, they walk carefully thro the house toward the room where John’s body was left, pas by the havoc they've wreaked. They take notice of the fac that bodies have been moved. On the way, THREE keeps wandering off, requiring TWO to usher him forward.

dialogues.speaker: TWO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (Whispering) Come on, this way. THREE wanders off again.

dialogues.speaker: TWO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dude. Don’t fuck around...

dialogues.text: I want to find this son of a bitch.

dialogues.text: I don’t care what you want. This is about John... Two, frustrated, points the camera around where THREE is looking, revealing nothing.

dialogues.speaker: TWO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Either follow me, or you’re on your own tonight.

dialogues.text: (Yelling) Was it you or your kike daughter that killed my brother!  59.

dialogues.text: I got your little whore here with me! I’1l make you a granddaddy if you don’t come out! There is no response.

dialogues.text: (Whispering) I guess we should probably kill him. No witnesses.

dialogues.text: Yeah. DAN grabs TWO from behind, pressing a knife against his n Camera drops to the floor.

dialogues.text: Whoa! Fuck!  60.

dialogues.text: Just give her to me. Give her back to me!

dialogues.text: Take it easy...

dialogues.text: You put down the gun! THREE kneels down and drops Lindsay on the ground. Instea of putting down his gun, he picks up the camera and point at DAN’s face.

dialogues.text: Put the gun down! Three puts the Camera down on the table and it captures t whole scene from a wideshot side angle.

dialogues.text: Put down the fucking gun!

dialogues.text: Don’t fucking let this fuck kill me!

dialogues.text: Why would that matter? Do you think I'm joking?

dialogues.text: Oh no... Don’t do that!

dialogues.text: Give her to me. Three props up Lindsay and holds her up.

dialogues.text: Lindsay! Three hits her on the back of the head with the gun and s goes out cold again. He holds her lifeless body close to with a gun to her head.

dialogues.text: (Singing) Oh Danny Boy, The Pipes.

dialogues.text: Just fucking listen to him! Three let’s go of Lindsay’s body and she falls to the flo Dan is stunned for a second and loosen’s his grip. Sudden TWO breaks free and tackles DAN. DAN loses the knife.

dialogues.text: Whoa! Whoa! TWO and DAN wrestle on the floor. THREE continues to film while approaching them. THREE grabs DAN and throws him of TWO.

dialogues.text: This is for killing my brother! THREE kneels down and repeatedly bashes DAN over the head with the camera. THREE (CONT’D) You fucking Jew!

dialogues.text: Hahaha! Bam! DAN is dead. TWO kneels down to catch his breath.

dialogues.text: We gotta put her in the backseat, she won't fit. Open up the door. TWO complies and THREE places LINDSEY in the backseat and covers her with a blanket. They enter the car and speed o Once they start driving, they remove their masks.

dialogues.text: I can’t believe this.

dialogues.text: Oh yeah, and then the girl’s gonna be missing too. People are going to figure it all out. They’1l make the connection. Did your parents see you leave with John?

dialogues.text: Whatever. Knowing you, you’ll end up killing her when you’re fucking her. THREE explodes.  68.

dialogues.text: Get that fucking thing out of my face! THREE grabs the camera and throws it into the back.

dialogues.speaker: TWO
dialogues.text: She's fucking jailbait. Sick fuck. TWO and THREE are silent for a minute, and then the car p into a gas station.

dialogues.speaker: THREE
dialogues.text: There’s nobody around. I’m getting a pack of cigarettes, watch my bitch. THREE opens the door and exits the car.

dialogues.speaker: TWO
dialogues.text: Are you fucking kidding me? Jesus. LINDSEY suddenly grabs the camera and makes a break for freedom from the driver’s side of the car while screaming help. TWO starts yelling and opens up the passenger door chase after her.

dialogues.speaker: TWO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Get the fuck back here! TWO chases after LINDSEY. While fleeing, she lobs the camera. She screams. About 30 seconds go by, after which gagged, struggling LINDSEY can be heard being taken back the car. THREE has come back outside.

dialogues.speaker: THREE
dialogues.text: How the fuck did she get out? I leave you alone for...  69. Car doors are heard slamming, with faint commotion contin to emanate from the car while LINDSEY is being restrained TWO and THREE can be heard driving off. Camera cuts off abruptly. Screen goes black. We hold on black for a few seconds. Then The Epilogue com in over the black. Epilogue: (Over Black) “The Footage was found in the store parking lot by a patr later that night. Based on the video footage found, TWO and THREE were identified and apprehended two weeks later. LINDSEY was found alive in THREE’s basement, where she wa brutally tortured and raped repeatedly. LINDSEY testified at trial against TWO and THREE, who wer convicted of 4 counts of murder, rape, etc. Their names are Bill Buckly and Thomas Middle. John’s full name was John Buckly Jr. They received increased penalties due to the Violent Crim Control and Law Enforcement Act and are now serving multi life sentences. LINDSEY is currently 20 years old and adjusting to life without her family. 80,000 hate related crimes occur each year in the United States, and the number has been increasing each year for past decade.  Hate and Prejudice still exists today.” The End 70.
